Auditory Hallucinations are quite normal and only 5% of people with them are termed schizophrenics, if you are troubled by voices, maybe Avatar Therapy can help. At Vayu Vaidya, we have developed a version of this therapy using Pillow Buddies(c) , a social bot based therapy where you create cartoon based buddies and chatbots that go with them from existing templates on personalityforge.com and https://www.instructables.com/id/Pillow-Buddiesc/, the DIY or pro pillow buddies(c) therapy.
